title: Railworks TS2014 TaD Basic Line Pacific SurflinerÂ® Passenger
description:
This Basic Line scenario pack takes you to sunny California. On the famous and scenic Pacific SurflinerÃ‚Â® Route* between L.A. and San Diego operated by AMTRAK and the BNSF you will have the chance to drive passenger services  connection the southern region with the capitol of Californias most known and famous city: Los Angeles, and also freight services using the BNSF ES44DC Addon*. From nightruns to services running on the most beautiful parts of the route: ThereÃ‚Â´s something for everyone!

aD Basic Line: Northbound Auto Train
You are driving an Autorack train from Fullerton to Pico Rivera. This should be an easy run without any problems.

TaD Basic Line: Heading South
You are taking over a freight train at Anaheim. Your destination is Stuart Mesa where your shift ends.

TaD Basic Line: Late Night Run
You are taking a freight to Fallbrook. ItÃ‚Â´s a quiet night and you should have a clear road to your destination.

TaD Basic Line: Pacific Surfliner 591 Pt 1
Drive the first part of a northbound Pacific Surfliner on a nice Californian evening. (San Diego to San Clemente Pier.)

TaD Basic Line: Pacific Surfliner 591 Pt 2
Second part of the scenario: San Clemente Pier to Los Angeles Union Station.

TaD Basic Line: Pacific Surfliner 768 Pt 1
First part of the southbound Pacific Surfliner scenario. Starting at Los Angeles and ending at San Clemente Pier.

TaD Basic Line: Pacific Surfliner 768 Pt 2
